title: Decisional Metric Compliance Veto Report
description: Defines the structured report generated when S03_Compliance_Veto_Status evaluates to TRUE, forcing an immediate halt to decisional calculus and requiring formal governance review.

Veto_Timestamp_UTC.description: The exact time the veto condition was met.

Veto_Trigger_Source.description: The source system or component that mandated the compliance veto.

Veto_Policy_ID.description: Identifier of the specific governance or compliance policy that was violated.

Severity_Level.description: The classified severity of the policy violation (1=Minor, 5=Catastrophic).

Origin_Source_Artifact.description: Reference hash or ID of the L3 Proof Manifest (PMH-V1) artifact tied to the vetoed metric attempt.

Detailed_Reasoning.description: Structured, human-readable explanation of the veto event and necessary corrective action.
